content: [La 2 (ADC) 3 (H 2 O) 6 ]·2H 2 O (1) . An aqueous solution of 0.35 M lanthanum nitrate was allowed to diffuse in a silica gel column containing 0.5 M H2ADC at pH = 6. Crystals suitable for X-ray analysis were formed after about five months. Elemental analysis calcd (%) for 1:  C 19.00, H 2.11; found:  C 19.11, H 2.23.
clean_text:
Experimental Section

 [La  2  (ADC)  3  (H  2  O)  6  ]⋅2H  2  O (1) . An aqueous solution of 0.35 M lanthanum nitrate was allowed to diffuse in a silica gel column containing 0.5 M H2ADC at pH = 6. Crystals suitable for X-ray analysis were formed after about five months. Elemental analysis calcd (%) for 1: C 19.00, H 2.11; found: C 19.11, H 2.23.
